============================================
core/specify/module_paths
============================================

specify

    (A => Q) = 10;
    (B => Q) = (12);
    (C, D *> Q) = 18;

    (posedge clock => (out +: in)) = (10, 8);

    (negedge clock[0] => (out -: in)) = (10, 8);

    (clock => (out : in)) = (10, 8);

endspecify

----

(source_file
  (specify_block
    (specify_item
      (path_declaration
        (simple_path_declaration
          (parallel_path_description
            (specify_input_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier))
            (specify_output_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier)))
          (path_delay_value
            (list_of_path_delay_expressions
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (primary_literal
                        (integral_number
                          (decimal_number
                            (unsigned_number)))))))))))))
    (specify_item
      (path_declaration
        (simple_path_declaration
          (parallel_path_description
            (specify_input_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier))
            (specify_output_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier)))
          (path_delay_value
            (list_of_path_delay_expressions
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (constant_mintypmax_expression
                        (constant_expression
                          (constant_primary
                            (primary_literal
                              (integral_number
                                (decimal_number
                                  (unsigned_number))))))))))))))))
    (specify_item
      (path_declaration
        (simple_path_declaration
          (full_path_description
            (list_of_path_inputs
              (specify_input_terminal_descriptor
                (simple_identifier))
              (specify_input_terminal_descriptor
                (simple_identifier)))
            (list_of_path_outputs
              (specify_output_terminal_descriptor
                (simple_identifier))))
          (path_delay_value
            (list_of_path_delay_expressions
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (primary_literal
                        (integral_number
                          (decimal_number
                            (unsigned_number)))))))))))))
    (specify_item
      (path_declaration
        (edge_sensitive_path_declaration
          (parallel_edge_sensitive_path_description
            (edge_identifier)
            (specify_input_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier))
            (specify_output_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier))
            (polarity_operator)
            (data_source_expression
              (expression
                (primary
                  (hierarchical_identifier
                    (simple_identifier))))))
          (path_delay_value
            (list_of_path_delay_expressions
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (primary_literal
                        (integral_number
                          (decimal_number
                            (unsigned_number))))))))
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (primary_literal
                        (integral_number
                          (decimal_number
                            (unsigned_number)))))))))))))
    (specify_item
      (path_declaration
        (edge_sensitive_path_declaration
          (parallel_edge_sensitive_path_description
            (edge_identifier)
            (specify_input_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier)
              (constant_expression
                (constant_primary
                  (primary_literal
                    (integral_number
                      (decimal_number
                        (unsigned_number)))))))
            (specify_output_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier))
            (polarity_operator)
            (data_source_expression
              (expression
                (primary
                  (hierarchical_identifier
                    (simple_identifier))))))
          (path_delay_value
            (list_of_path_delay_expressions
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (primary_literal
                        (integral_number
                          (decimal_number
                            (unsigned_number))))))))
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (primary_literal
                        (integral_number
                          (decimal_number
                            (unsigned_number)))))))))))))
    (specify_item
      (path_declaration
        (edge_sensitive_path_declaration
          (parallel_edge_sensitive_path_description
            (specify_input_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier))
            (specify_output_terminal_descriptor
              (simple_identifier))
            (data_source_expression
              (expression
                (primary
                  (hierarchical_identifier
                    (simple_identifier))))))
          (path_delay_value
            (list_of_path_delay_expressions
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (primary_literal
                        (integral_number
                          (decimal_number
                            (unsigned_number))))))))
              (path_delay_expression
                (constant_mintypmax_expression
                  (constant_expression
                    (constant_primary
                      (primary_literal
                        (integral_number
                          (decimal_number
                            (unsigned_number)))))))))))))))
